name: Tappy Dunk! - Tap Sports 2k19
description:
HEY fella! Want to challenge your skills in this dunking mania challenge game?
Great, I'm glad to hear you'll participate in this challenge. First you'll need your fingers, a little focus, some practice and you are one step away of destroying the game leaderboards!

Show everyone how good you are! Let's goooooooooooooooooo!
